/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the various colors of the buildings and vehicles.
